Assessment.QuestionText: Which of these statements about <font face="courier new">Date</font> controls are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">DateTimePicker</font> control is used to select a date and time from a specified range of dates and times.
The <font face="courier new">DateTimePickerFormat</font> is used to specify a date format for the <font face="courier new">DateTimePicker</font> control.
The <font face="courier new">CustomFormat</font> property is used to display only date in various formats.
The <font face="courier new">Format</font> property of the <font face="courier new">DateTimePicker</font> control is used to display standard and custom date formats.
The <font face="courier new">Short</font>value of the <font face="courier new">Format</font> property is used to display date in dd-mm-yyyy format.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)–(False), (B)–(True), (C)–(False), (D)–(True), and (E)-(False).
